abstract: Patrick Stewart returns in an energetic stand-alone series about the “Next Generation” hero Jean-Luc Picard. So much for the admiral’s quiet life at the chateau.
lead_paragraph: Like a nice glass of refreshing liquid — tea, Earl Grey, hot even — Jean-Luc Picard is back in our living rooms. And the creative team behind “Star Trek: Picard” would like you to know it is decidedly not as if he never left.
